files.template:
version: '3.8'
services:
  zookeeper:
    image: confluentinc/cp-zookeeper:latest
    environment: { ZOOKEEPER_CLIENT_PORT: 2181 }
  kafka:
    image: confluentinc/cp-kafka:latest
    depends_on: [ zookeeper ]
    environment: { KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT: zookeeper:2181, KAFKA_LISTENERS: PLAINTEXT://:9092, KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS: PLAINTEXT://kafka:9092 }
